original_text: ‘I killed many people among you, as I destroyed the cities called Sodom and Gomorrah. Some of you did not die. You were like a stick that is already burning. And someone saves it from the fire. But still you did not start to pray to me again.’ The Lord says this!
korean_text: 내가 너희 중의 성읍 무너뜨리기를 하나님인 내가 소돔과 고모라를 무너뜨림 같이 하였으므로 너희가 불붙는 가운데서 빼낸 나무 조각 같이 되었으나 너희가 내게로 돌아오지 아니하였느니라 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: I killed many people among you
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너희 중 많은 사람들을 죽였다

sentences.original_text: as I destroyed the cities called Sodom and Gomorrah
sentences.korean_translation: 소돔과 고모라라 불리는 도시들을 멸망시킨 것처럼

sentences.original_text: Some of you did not die
You were like a stick that is already burning
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 이미 타고 있는 막대기 같았다

sentences.original_text: And someone saves it from the fire
But still you did not start to pray to me again
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 여전히 너희는 다시 나에게 기도하기 시작하지 않았다
